name: Meltdown (itch) (wasted name)
description:
You are just a normal person craving some good old ice cream.

BUT! Some evil man has got some other plans. You are entrapped into the metro without an escape. Since the ice cream is for the date, you mustn't eat it! Try to keep it cold and not let ever-increasing heat melt your ice cream down.

There's no win, only bragging rights on how long u lasted (in the game...), score is shown at the end

Made for the University of Tartu and Ludum Dare 50 GameJam, 
Theme "Delay the inevitable"

Made by Karlis Saarna, Johannes Tammerand, Oliver Kane
4th place at UT GameJam
